alert.note: Alert for Deltana and Tanana Flats; Denali; Eastern Alaska Range (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 06 at 12:16PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...GUSTY WINDS FOR ALASKA RANGE PASSES AND THE CENTRAL INTERIOR WEDNESDAY NIGHT INTO THURSDAY... A low pressure system approaching west of the area will bring gusty south winds through Alaska Range Passes and the Central Interior beginning Wednesday night. For Alaska Range Passes, winds will begin to pick up Wednesday night, with gusts up to 60 mph by Thursday morning. The strongest winds will be just south of Healy and south of Delta Junction through Thursday, before tapering off by Friday afternoon. For the Central Interior, winds will begin to pick up early Thursday morning, with gusts up to 40 mph across summits and 30 mph elsewhere, including Fairbanks. Winds will begin to taper off Thursday night.

area.areaDesc: Deltana and Tanana Flats; Denali; Eastern Alaska Range
